title: Flight 93 National Memorial: Group Visits - Cars, Vans, Motorcycles, etc.
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations     Group Visits - Cars, Vans, Motorcycles, etc.                Group Visits - Cars, Vans, Motorcycles, etc.       Notify Us of a Visit to the Memorial  Bringing a car tour, motorcycle ride, youth trip, or other group to the memorial? Please notify our staff of your visit via e-mail. Traveling by bus/motorcoach? Click here.  Information needed for notification: Â·         Date of visit Time Number in group (including chaperones) Number and type of vehicles (vans, cars, motorcycles, etc.) Grade of class (if school) School or Organization name Group Contact: Name of teacher/leader Phone Number E-mail address Tour Company  The Group Coordinator will contact you if there are any questions in regards to your reservation. Final Preparations for Your Visit  Be sure to review "Know Before You Go" and Group Frequently Asked Questions Check our current operating hours and seasons. Make sure you have the most recent driving directions. Download and print park maps.  Contact the park office with questions - 814-893-6545
